name: Dell PowerProtect DD权限提升漏洞
product: ["DELL Data Domain Operating System <8.3.0.0", "DELL Data Domain Operating System <7.10.1.50", "DELL Data Domain Operating System  <7.13.1.20"]
description: Dell PowerProtect DD是戴尔公司的数据保护解决方案，用于备份和恢复数据。Dell PowerProtect DD存在安全漏洞。攻击者可利用该漏洞导致权限提升。
solution:
厂商已提供漏洞修复方案，请关注厂商主页更新：
https://www.dell.com/support/kbdoc/en-us/000279157/dsa-2025-022-security-update-for-dell-powerprotect-dd-multiple-vulnerabilities
patch: Dell PowerProtect DD权限提升漏洞的补丁
